\startenvironment northumbria
\usemodule[database]
% \usemodule[gnuplot]

\usepath[{chapter,graphics}]
\doifmodeelse{*product}
 {\setupexternalfigures[directory={graphics}]}

\placebookmarks[chapter,section,subsection][chapter,section]
\setupinteractionscreen[option=bookmark]

\setupinteraction
[
  state=start,
  color=darkolivegreen,
  title={Proactive threat detection of cyber-physical systems using Bayesian estimation: connected cars as a case study},
  author={Adam Reviczky},
  subtitle={Dissertation},
  keyword={northumbria},
]

\setuppapersize[A4,portrait][A4,portrait]
\mainlanguage[uk]
\definefontfeature[default][default][protrusion=quality,expansion=quality]
\setupalign[hz,hanging]
\setupbodyfont[palatino,12pt]

\define\studentname{Adam Reviczky}
\define\studentnumber{14044980}

\setupspellchecking[state=start,method=2]
\ctxlua{languages.words.threshold=1}
\setupbibtex[database={dissertation},sort=author]
\setuppublications[alternative=apa]

\usecolors[xwi]

\setupbackgrounds[page][background=color,backgroundcolor=\ctxlua{if \rawcountervalue[userpage] == 1 then context("darkolivegreen") end}]
\setuphead[chapter,section,subsection][alternative=margin]
\setuppagenumbering[location=footer,left={},right={},style={\ss}]

% chapter numbering in ToC
\setuplist[chapter,section][numbercommand=\listchapter,width=0pt]
\definemargindata[listchapter][hoffset=1em,location=left,style=]
\setupcombinedlist[content][list={chapter,section,subsection}]

\setupcaptions[prefix=yes,way=bysection,prefixsegments=2:4]

\setupheader[state=stop]
\setupfooter[state=stop]
\stopsectionblockenvironment
